body_text: Does this need to be part of the arguments? I don't think any consumer of this will need this value, and it is mostly a UI treatment. I think it would be better to not include it here if that is possible.
body: Does this need to be part of the arguments? I don't think any consumer of this will need this value, and it is mostly a UI treatment. I think it would be better to not include it here if that is possible.
